TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Enlistment extends System.Object

summary.span: 促进登记的事务参与者和事务管理器之间在事务的最后阶段中的通信。

span.span: Facilitates communication between an enlisted transaction participant and the transaction manager during the final phase of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用 对象的 和 方法以便在事务中登记参与者时，它们将返回描述登记的对象。When the and methods of the object are invoked to enlist a participant in a transaction, they return this object describing the enlistment. 在事务提交的最后阶段，事务管理器将此对象传递到一个资源管理器，该管理器实现已在事务中登记的 接口。During the final phase of the transaction commit, the transaction manager passes this object to a resource manager implementing the interface that has enlisted in a transaction. 具体而言，事务管理器会调用 或参与者的 方法，具体取决于后者是决定提交还是回滚事务。Specifically, the transaction manager calls either the or the method of the participant, depending on whether the latter has decided to commit or roll back the transaction. 参与者应调用此对象的 方法，以使事务管理器知道该对象已完成其工作。The participant should call the method of this object to let the transaction manager know that it has completed its work. 在准备阶段调用 之前，一个登记可以随时调用 方法。An enlistment can call the method at anytime before it has called in the prepare phase. 这样，登记就会强制转换为只读投票，这意味着它会在事务上提交，但不需要接收最终结果。By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome. 请注意，在调用 方法后，登记的参与者将不会从事务管理器收到进一步的通知。Note that, after the method is called, the enlisted participant receives no further notifications from the transaction manager. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 接口的实现，以及何时应调用 方法。The following example shows an implementation of the interface, and when the method should be called. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#2)]

related.span: 在事务中将资源登记为参与者

span.span: Enlisting Resources As Participants In A Transaction

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Done() cil managed

summary.span: 指示事务参与者已完成其工作。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction participant has completed its work.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事务提交的最后阶段，事务管理器将调用参与者的 、 或 方法，具体取决于是否提交或回滚事务。During the final phase of the transaction commit, the transaction manager calls either the , or method of the participant, depending on whether the transaction is to be committed or rolled back. 资源管理器应执行完成事务所需的任何工作，然后通过对 `enlistment` 参数调用 方法，通知事务管理器已完成。The resource manager should perform any work necessary to finish the transaction and then inform the transaction manager that it has finished by calling the method on the `enlistment` parameter. 如果资源管理器已登记持久，但未通过调用 方法进行响应，则事务管理器无法确定资源管理器是否已收到相应的通知调用。If the resource manager has enlisted durably, but does not respond by calling method, the transaction manager is unsure that the resource manager has received the respective notification call. 因此，事务管理器会继续等待响应并维护与此事务相关的信息。As such, the transaction manager keeps waiting for a response, and maintains information relevant to this transaction. 如果永远不会调用 ，则此信息会无限期保存在内存中或系统范围内的资源中。If is never called, this piece of information is kept around indefinitely in memory or in a system-wide resource. 这将导致无法回收资源。This results in resources not being able to be reclaimed. 对于分布式事务，此操作最终可能会填充 MSDTC 日志来暂停 MSDTC 进程。In the case of a distributed transaction, this could eventually fill the MSDTC log which halts the MSDTC process. 如果事务由 管理，这会导致资源管理器进程的内存消耗逐步增加。In the case of a transaction managed by , this results in a gradual and continual increase in the memory consumption of the resource manager's process. 因此，在资源管理器完成准备工作后，调用 方法非常重要。Therefore, it is crucial that you call the method once your resource manager is done with your prepare work. 在准备阶段调用 之前，一个登记可以随时调用 方法。An enlistment can call the method at anytime before it has called in the prepare phase. 这样，登记就会强制转换为只读投票，这意味着它会在事务上提交，但不需要接收最终结果。By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome. 请注意，在调用此方法后，登记的参与者将不会从事务管理器接收更多通知。Note that, after this method is called, the enlisted participant receives no further notifications from the transaction manager.

related.span: 在事务中将资源登记为参与者
